executive_summary: Implementation of Galaxy Defender as a pure HTML/JavaScript client-side game featuring a rocket ship that follows mouse movement horizontally while avoiding falling asteroids and UFOs, collecting stars for points. The game includes progressive difficulty scaling, collision detection, scoring system, and game over mechanics.

tasks.description: Create HTML structure and basic styling
tasks.requirements: Set up the main HTML file with canvas element for game rendering, basic CSS for styling and responsive design, and include space-themed visual elements
tasks.test_criteria: HTML file loads properly, canvas is visible and properly sized, basic styling is applied

tasks.description: Initialize game canvas and basic game loop
tasks.requirements: Set up HTML5 canvas context, implement requestAnimationFrame game loop, create basic game state management (playing, game over)
tasks.test_criteria: Canvas initializes correctly, game loop runs at 60fps, game state can be toggled

tasks.description: Implement player rocket with mouse-following movement
tasks.requirements: Create player entity (🚀 rocket emoji), implement horizontal mouse tracking movement, constrain movement to canvas boundaries
tasks.test_criteria: Rocket appears on screen, follows mouse cursor horizontally, stays within canvas bounds

tasks.requirements: Implement object spawning system from top of screen, create asteroid (☄️) and UFO (🛸) entities, implement downward movement at high speed, handle object removal when off-screen
tasks.test_criteria: Objects spawn randomly from top, move downward at appropriate speed, are removed when off-screen

tasks.requirements: Create star (⭐) entities that fall from top, implement collision detection between player and stars, remove stars on collection
tasks.test_criteria: Stars spawn and fall, disappear when player touches them, no game over on star contact

tasks.description: Implement collision detection and game over
tasks.requirements: Create collision detection system between player and asteroids/UFOs, trigger immediate game over on contact, display game over screen
tasks.test_criteria: Game ends immediately when player touches asteroid or UFO, game over screen appears

tasks.requirements: Track and display current score, add 50 points for each star collected, show score on game over screen
tasks.test_criteria: Score increases by 50 when collecting stars, current score is visible during gameplay, final score shown on game over

tasks.requirements: Increase game speed every 10 seconds, track elapsed time, apply speed multiplier to falling objects
tasks.test_criteria: Game becomes noticeably faster every 10 seconds, difficulty progression is smooth and challenging

tasks.requirements: Implement restart button on game over screen, reset all game state (score, speed, objects), return to playing state
tasks.test_criteria: Game can be restarted from game over screen, all values reset to initial state

tasks.requirements: Optimize rendering performance, add smooth animations, ensure consistent frame rate, add visual feedback for collections
tasks.test_criteria: Game runs smoothly at 60fps, no performance issues, visual effects enhance gameplay

file_structure.description: Simple client-side structure with HTML entry point, CSS styling, and JavaScript game logic
